description:
Systemd-free distro Nitrux 3.7.1 is out with Linux kernel 6.11, updated drivers, enhanced security, and performance boosts for new hardware.

The post Nitrux 3.7.1 Launches with Linux kernel 6.11 and Latest Hardware Support appeared first on Linux Today.
title: Nitrux 3.7.1 Launches with Linux kernel 6.11 and Latest Hardware Support

description:
Alpha 3 of System76’s COSMIC desktop is now available with improved customizable theming, applets, and adaptable windows designed to improve your Linux workflow.

The post COSMIC Desktop Alpha 3 Released, Here’s What’s New appeared first on Linux Today.
title: COSMIC Desktop Alpha 3 Released, Here’s What’s New

description:
The PCLinuxOS Magazine staff is pleased to announce the release of the November 2024 issue. With the exception of a brief period in 2009, The PCLinuxOS Magazine has been published on a monthly basis since September, 2006. The PCLinuxOS Magazine is a product of the PCLinuxOS community, published by volunteers from the community. The magazine […]

The post The November 2024 Issue of the PCLinuxOS Magazine appeared first on Linux Today.
title: The November 2024 Issue of the PCLinuxOS Magazine

description:
While most of us are already enjoying the LibreOffice 24.8 release, The Document Foundation still maintains the LibreOffice 24.2 branch, which is supported until November 30th, 2024

The post LibreOffice 24.2.7 Is Out as the Last Update in the Series, Upgrade to LibreOffice 24.8 appeared first on Linux Today.
title: LibreOffice 24.2.7 Is Out as the Last Update in the Series, Upgrade to LibreOffice 24.8

description:
Discover a step-by-step tutorial for downloading YouTube audio and video on Linux from the command line using yt-dlp.

The post Download YouTube Videos on Linux from CLI Using yt-dlp appeared first on Linux Today.
title: Download YouTube Videos on Linux from CLI Using yt-dlp

description:
In this beginner’s guide, I’ll assist in installing the latest version of NeoVim on your preferred Linux distribution and provide some tips for navigating its usage.

The post How to Install Latest NeoVim on Linux (Ultimate Guide) appeared first on Linux Today.
title: How to Install Latest NeoVim on Linux (Ultimate Guide)

description:
Recordbox is a music player and library browser designed primarily to be as simple as possible, and tailored specifically to browsing and playing albums, rather than tracks or playlists. It’s written in Rust and published under an open source license.

The post Recordbox – simple but sweet music player appeared first on Linux Today.
title: Recordbox – simple but sweet music player

description:
The AlmaLinux OS Foundation announced that effective immediately its namesake Linux distribution is an Endorsed Distribution on Azure, Microsoft’s public cloud. Azure has rewarded only six other distributions with that distinction.

The post Azure Grants AlmaLinux Rarefied ‘Endorsed Distribution’ Status appeared first on Linux Today.
title: Azure Grants AlmaLinux Rarefied ‘Endorsed Distribution’ Status
